Some Kaipara road slips from February storms could take three years to fix https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/dozens-of-kaipara-storm-slips-still-to-be-repaired/WNLRPZ3L45ASDH7P3KFQ4QZHHU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/dozens-of-kaipara-storm-slips-still-to-be-repaired/WNLRPZ3L45ASDH7P3KFQ4QZHHU/ There are 71 slips still impacting Kaipara roads after multiple severe weather events. Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:04:05 +0000 This slip on Peeblebrooke Rd, Mangawhai, was repaired in July, but many more slips in the Kaipara caused by severe weather events might not be fixed before mid-2024.
